author: ningjiang
msg: CAMEL-4649 Fixed the NPE issue of DefaultCxfBinding when the soap body is empty

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-2740: Fixed memory leak when doing request/reply over JMS with a fixed replyTo queue. Due correlationIDs in JMSMessage Selector not in sync with current active correlation ids.

author: coheigea
msg: [SANTUARIO-252] - Made Xalan, Xerces + xml-apis optional in the project pom
- Reverted to DocumentSerializer by default as it does not work without Xalan.
- Xalan (+ xerces + xmlapis) are now optional and only required to support the XPath here() function
